requirements.summary: Update LoginPage component to use bilingual translations for all text content including mission statement, feature descriptions, and button labels
acceptanceCriteria: All text content on LoginPage displays in the user's selected language (English or French)
Mission statement, feature cards, and login button text are translated
Language switch updates all text on the page immediately without page reload

file_operations.description: Replace all hardcoded English text strings with translation keys from the translations system. Import useLanguage hook from LanguageContext to access translations. Update hero title, mission statement, feature card titles and descriptions, and login button text to use translation keys like t.login.heroTitle, t.login.missionStatement, t.login.features[0].title, etc. Ensure the component re-renders when language changes via the context.

requirements.summary: Add French translations for all LoginPage text strings to the translations system, ensuring complete parity with English content
acceptanceCriteria: French translations exist for hero title, mission statement, all feature cards (titles and descriptions), and call-to-action button
Translation keys follow existing naming conventions in the translations system
No untranslated text remains on the LoginPage when French locale is selected

file_operations.description: Add French translations to the existing translations object for all LoginPage content. Create or expand the 'login' translation section with keys for heroTitle, missionStatement, features array (with title and description for each feature), and loginButton. Ensure French translations are culturally appropriate and maintain the same tone as English content. Follow the existing translation structure pattern used in the file (e.g., common, header, footer sections).
